step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, relaxed.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your elbows wide and chest open.
Smooth return to the starting position. Well done on completing the first repetition.
Second rep starting strong! Hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Good job bringing your hands up. Focus on keeping those elbows in as you move towards your forehead.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Maintain that upright posture.
Holding the position well. Keep the elbows wide and chest open.
Great job reversing the motion and returning to the start. You've completed both repetitions.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when bringing your hands up, and spread them wide behind your head while keeping your head upright. This helps maximize the stretch and lymph flow.
